data.name: Annihilate The Spance Demo
data.detailed_description:
The Gameplay
Annihilate The Spance is a singleplayer real-time strategy game. Focused around a campaign that sees you handle base building, economy, and armadas of autonomous star ships. In ATS your units cannot be commanded individually - but you have many solutions to direct them towards your goals. Each starship has some slight intelligence, and will attempt to do it's best along side it's brethren in the heat of battle.

Ultimately, test your ability to respond to situations as they change and shift in the chaotic tide of a 3D battlefield. ATS features an unlocked height plain, allowing starships to fly up, down, and around their enemies. Battles are multiple stories high, and can bend and shift as capital vessels arrive upon the battlefield. ATS has a wide unit scale, ranging from tiny drones to massive capital vessels that can level entire bases multiple times over.

Each ship in ATS is autonomous. Moving, targeting, and attacking on its own while you focus on making higher-level strategic decisions. Plan your army composition carefully. Calculate build cycles. Make tactical positioning decisions. There is no single ship that can win this battle. Compose a mixture of ships from across your entire selection of blueprints. Exploit your enemies weaknesses and amplify your strengths, to annihilate the enemy.

The Story
ATS is set in a future following the discovery of a mysterious super dense nebula-like anomaly known as the Spance. A huge ball of matter and energy that has roamed the galaxy for eons, dragging hundreds of solar systems into its depths. Extreme and inexplicable phenomena make navigation of the Spance treacherous, but the unfathomable riches contained within offer a lucrative new frontier full of promise.

Four interlinked campaigns will take you through the depths of the Spance. Fight with and against each of the major factions as they struggle towards their goal for the Spance and its treasures. All the while gaining access to new units and technologies. Learn the unique doctrines needed to command the military might of The Kontaalen Armada, the united fleets of The Vaalkorei Coalition mercantile guilds, and the experimental technologies of Emar's Tychon Division. Delve ever deeper into the impenetrable abyss of the Spance and unlock its secrets.

Skirmish, Custom Maps, and the Level Editor
Furthermore, you can jump directly into Skirmishes against AI opponents in custom maps and levels. Our game features a full in-game level editor that can be used to create your own scenarios.

data.short_description: A singleplayer realtime strategy game with a focus on autonomous starships. Don't worry about individual units, direct your armada. Test your ability to respond to situations as they change and shift in the chaotic tide of a fully 3D battlefield. Watch your armada annihilate your enemies.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7+
  • Processor: 4 Core, 2.5 GHZ+
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Anything produced after 2009
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Let us know if you can get it running at 30fps on anything less.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7+
  • Processor: 4 Core, 3.5 GHZ+
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Anything produced after 2015
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: These are the specs of one of the developer's computers.
